title: Rabbi Akiva Eiger on Shulchan Arukh, Choshen Mishpat

enDesc: Short but highly insightful notes originally written in the margins of Rabbi Akiva Eiger's personal copy of the Shulchan Arukh, the notes includes questions, citations of relevant sources and mention of printing or scribal errors.
